          /*! autoprefixer: off */.body--loading .preload-spinner-container{display:inline}.preload-spinner-wrapper{min-height:500px}.preload-spinner-container{position:absolute;left:50%;margin-top:50px;margin-left:-32px;width:22.5%;max-width:64px;min-width:36px}.preload-spinner-container .preload-spinner{animation:delaySpinner 1s,rotate360Animation 2s linear infinite;width:100%;height:100%}.preload-spinner-container .preload-spinner .preload-spinner__circle--bg{stroke:#dadad2;opacity:.4}.preload-spinner-container .preload-spinner .preload-spinner__circle{stroke-width:2;fill:none}.preload-spinner-container .preload-spinner .preload-spinner__circle--dash{stroke:#fff;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-miterlimit:10;animation:spinnerDashAnimation 1.5s ease-in-out infinite}.preload-text{text-align:center;min-width:300px;padding:24px 0;transform:translateX(calc(-50% + 32px));color:#fff}@keyframes delaySpinner{0%{opacity:0}99%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes rotate360Animation{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes spinnerDashAnimation{0%{stroke-dasharray:1,200;stroke-dashoffset:0}50%{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-35}to{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-124}}
